scripts.dev: npm run predev:check && concurrently -k -n shared,functions,web "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:functions" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:shared: npm run predev:check && npm run watch --workspace=packages/shared
scripts.dev:web: npm run predev:check && npm run build:shared && npm run dev --workspace=apps/web
scripts.dev:functions: npm run predev:check && npm run build:shared && concurrently -k -n func-build,func-host "npm run watch --workspace=packages/functions" "npm run start --workspace=packages/functions"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=apps/web && npm run build --workspace=packages/functions
scripts.build:web: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=apps/web
scripts.build:functions: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=packages/functions
